entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon except gusting to 70 near thunderstorms late this afternoon. High 26. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
